HackThePlanet Supporting tagline

Propose a Hacking Event or Challenge

Submit a Pull Request with an event post in asdf and/or send email to hacktheplanet@lists.rackspace.com.

Monthly SF HackDays

Every first Wednesday of the month at Rackspace’s San Francisco Office

  • 9am: Start hacking
  • 6pm: Start demos
  • 8pm: Get dinner and/or move to a local bar

Send theme requests to hacktheplanet@lists.rackspace.com

  • 01 Feb 2012 » Twisted Python Hackday
